short_summary: -The department of global affairs Canada has a requirement for a quantity of 10 x Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch - with Apple M3 Max chip and AppleCare+ warranty and storage media retention or\u00a0or\u00a10 equivalent as per\u00a0the\u00a0list of deliverables in the request for quotation.Net total value of the requirement is to be determined in open market.
description: purchase of goods:Apple 16-inch Macbook Pro with M3 Max chip and AppleCare+ and storage media retention or equivalent
